name: DUI: The Game!
description:
Download the game for the full, higher quality experience!

It's 2 a.m. and your wife didn't sound too happy on the phone. Time to drive home from the bar...

Drink you problems away before you get home. Avoid crashing and don't get caught by the cops!

Controls:
- Driving: WASD
- Take a Drink: Spacebar (hold)

Obey the Law When the Cops Are Behind You:
- Speed Limit : 25 MPH
- Stay on the Street
- Don't Drink and Drive
- Don't Hit Other Cars
